name: braker

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
BRAKER is a pipeline for unsupervised RNA-Seq-based genome annotation
that combines the advantages of GeneMark-ET and AUGUSTUS

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-scalar-util-numeric
dependencies.description:
This module exports a number of wrappers around perl's builtin
grok_number function, which returns the numeric type of its argument, or
0 if it isn't numeric.

dependencies.name: perl-parallel-forkmanager
dependencies.description: A simple parallel processing fork manager

dependencies.name: perl-file-which
dependencies.description: Perl implementation of the which utility as an API

dependencies.name: perl-yaml
dependencies.description:
This module has been released to CPAN as YAML::Old, and soon YAML.pm
will be changed to just be a frontend interface module for all the
various Perl YAML implementation modules, including YAML::Old

dependencies.name: perl-hash-merge
dependencies.description: Hash::Merge merges two arbitrarily deep hashes into a single hash.

dependencies.name: perl-logger-simple
dependencies.description: Implementation of the Simran-Log-Log and Simran-Error-Error modules

dependencies.name: perl-file-homedir
dependencies.description: Find your home and other directories on any platform

dependencies.name: perl-list-moreutils
dependencies.description: Provide the stuff missing in List::Util

dependencies.name: augustus
dependencies.description:
AUGUSTUS is a program that predicts genes in eukaryotic genomic
sequences

dependencies.name: genemark-et
dependencies.description:
Gene Prediction in Bacteria, archaea, Metagenomes and
Metatranscriptomes. When downloaded this file is named the same for all
versions. Spack will search your current directory for the download
file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that Spack can find
it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html

dependencies.name: bamtools
dependencies.description: C++ API & command-line toolkit for working with BAM data.

dependencies.name: samtools
dependencies.description:
SAM Tools provide various utilities for manipulating alignments in the
SAM format, including sorting, merging, indexing and generating
alignments in a per-position format

dependencies.name: diamond
dependencies.description:
DIAMOND is a sequence aligner for protein and translated DNA searches,
designed for high performance analysis of big sequence data.
